Author: genericdietcola
Text: Even before my ED I’ve hated anyone in the kitchen while I made food. I’ve had my sister literally drop a tray of food on the floor because it was “in the way,” and my dad always tells me I don’t make my food right. I’ve always told my family it makes me nervous, and if I’m making food I’d rather it be empty, but of course they don’t listen, even when they’re not doing anything!
